actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 96-1046.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the manner in which the tax on transportation by air is required to be shown on airline tickets.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 96-1046) Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the present requirement that air transportation tickets indicate the total amount paid and the Federal excise tax for each segment of the transportation in cases where the ticket shows the total amount paid by segments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the manner in which the tax on transportation by air is required to be shown on airline tickets.
